column4: hello guys, I have very tricky setup out here, I need to reinstall grub on a x86_64 installation which uses lvm, and I can't chroot in there, and I'm running a x86 version of the live CD, there's anything that could be done in this situation????
i'm on karmic so my first though is always #ubuntu
mine too.. but they have provided some good assistance in the past since the question is relatively generic
